column1: obituary for: robert allen boling | cagle funeral home| mr. bobby boling
column3: passed away at cartersville medical center on tuesday june 9
column4: 2015. he is survived by his sisters: elizabeth gettle of acworth and betty jean clark of lady lake
column5: fl. graveside services are scheduled for 2pm on thursday june 11
column6: 2015 at cool springs baptist church cemetery with rev. joe lumpkin officiating. cagle funeral home is honored to serve the boling family.
